channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Even healthy brains decline with age. Here's what you can do
item.description: Scientists are finding ways to minimize the effects of aging on the brain. Here are some ways to keep it healthy.

item.title: How To Find the Right Medical Rehab Services
item.description: Specialized hospitals, nursing homes, clinics, and home health agencies provide rehab therapy. Insurers may limit the services you can get.

item.title: Americans' medical debt can stay in credit reports, judge rules. What does that mean?
item.description: The judge's decision vacated a rule imposed by the Biden administration earlier this year to keep medical debt from affecting credit scores.

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: “Health Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from the KFF Health News newsroom to the airwaves each week.
